textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: There are lots of poisonous mutants here - try not to suck them up\n as you chow down on the schools of fish. Hunting tuna love to\n take advantage of disoriented prey.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 Don't Forget to keep an eye out for oysters on the ocean
 floor!
